content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Copper Ore, and my inventory now reflects this addition. 
# I currently have 10 Copper Ore, along with some stone, iron ore, and iron plates.

# Now, I can return to the Stone Furnace and insert the Copper Ore to begin smelting it into Copper Plates.

# Let's insert 10 units of Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace to utilize its capacity and ensure efficient processing.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 units of Copper Ore into the furnace.

# After this insertion, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace again to confirm it is operational and processing the Copper Ore.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory again.
current_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Get the current status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory after inserting Copper Ore: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Status after insertion: {current_status}")  # Display the current status of the furnace.
